function.name: aero/function/ground-effect-factor-lift
function.description: Change in lift due to ground effect factor

function.name: aero/function/ground-effect-factor-drag
function.description: Change in drag due to ground effect

function.name: aero/force/Lift_alpha
function.description: Lift due to alpha Increase in CL decreases Period and damping,Dutch Roll damping CL is low for landing

function.name: aero/force/Drag_basic
function.description: Basic Drag Coefficient Sense: Always positive Main contributor to Phugoid damping: Greater Cd, Better damping The drag data is elaborate by DATCOM+ software, the loop parameter is 1 As it does not affect the average value (loop = 2 or 3) but the value for each flight altitude (air density) This option makes the speed of the airplane under the 10000 ft is slightly higher than that which occurs with loop = 2 or 3, as verified in reality.

function.name: aero/coefficient/Clb
function.description: Roll Moment coefficient due to Beta(per degree) Decrease of Clb to small negative value improves Dutch Roll Damping High Positive value leads to excessive spiral instability

function.name: aero/moment/Roll_damp
function.description: Roll moment due to roll rate

function.name: aero/moment/Roll_yaw
function.description: Roll moment due to yaw rate

function.name: aero/moment/Pitch_damp
function.description: Pitch moment due to pitch rate

function.name: aero/moment/Pitch_alphadot
function.description: Pitch moment due to alpha rate

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cnb
function.description: Yaw moment coefficient due to sideslip(per degree) Determines Dutch Roll and Spiral characteristics Prevents side-slip and yawing moments

function.name: aero/moment/Yaw_damp
function.description: Yaw moment due to yaw rate
